Mapping a New World
  • Explore
  • About
Above: Carte geographique de la Nouvelle France faictte par le sieur de Champlain Saint Tongois cappitaine ordinaire pour le roy en la marine

Mapping a New World is a digital humanities practice project that aims to create an online repository of Early North American cartography from the 17th and 18th century. The map collection included in this online demo focuses on New England and New France (the modern-day northeast U.S. and southeast Canada).

Browse the Collection
